Uses of Package
com.guardtime.envelope.manifest

  • Packages that use com.guardtime.envelope.manifest 
    Package Description
    com.guardtime.envelope.manifest
    Creating and handling envelope structure manifests
    com.guardtime.envelope.manifest.tlv
    Creating and handling of the manifests with TLV (Type Length Value) structure
    com.guardtime.envelope.packaging
    Creating an envelope
    com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.parsing
    Envelope parsing
    com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.parsing.handler
    Content handling (documents, annotations, manifests, etc)
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic
    Implementation of general verification rules
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature
    Signature specific verification rules
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature.ksi
    Implementation of KSI signature verification rules
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.manifest used by com.guardtime.envelope.manifest 
    Class and Description
    AnnotationDataReference
    SingleAnnotationManifest internal reference used for referring to annotation data in the envelope.
    AnnotationsManifest
    Envelope structure manifest containing references to SingleAnnotationManifest contained in the envelope.
    DocumentsManifest
    Envelope structure manifest containing references to documents contained in the envelope.
    FileReference
    Basic reference used by manifests to refer to files or other manifests.
    InvalidManifestException
    For issues when creating or parsing a manifest.
    Manifest
    Envelope structure manifest containing references to the AnnotationsManifest, DocumentsManifest, and EnvelopeSignature contained in the envelope.
    ManifestFactoryType
    Helper class used to convey manifest file extensions and type.
    SignatureReference
    Reference to a signature contained in an envelope.
    SingleAnnotationManifest
    Envelope internal structure manifest that contains some meta-data and reference to annotation data.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.manifest used by com.guardtime.envelope.manifest.tlv 
    Class and Description
    AnnotationsManifest
    Envelope structure manifest containing references to SingleAnnotationManifest contained in the envelope.
    DocumentsManifest
    Envelope structure manifest containing references to documents contained in the envelope.
    EnvelopeManifestFactory
    Creates or parses manifests used for envelope internal structure.
    InvalidManifestException
    For issues when creating or parsing a manifest.
